amendatorysection.catchline: Residential Lead-Based Paint Professions Practice Act; act, how cited.
amendatorysection.para: Sections 71-6318 to 71-6331.01 shall be known and may be cited as the Residential Lead-Based Paint Professions Practice Act.

crossreference.para: Lead-based paint removal, credentialing provisions, see sections 38-1,119 to 38-1,123.
